Nashville-Davidson.Wabash Cannonball (roller coaster): "The Wabash Cannon Ball" is an American folk song about an express train on the Wabash, St. Louis, & Pacific Railway and traveled on the Great Rock Island Route in the late 1800's. This legendary train was put into song and published on sheet music in 1882, titled "The Great Rock Island Route" and credited to J. A. Roff.
